text: Dinosaur Comics is a comic by Ryan North. It shows dinosaurs who have adventures and talk about philosophy and some other topics. The art is the same every day, but the words are different. This comic is intended to be funny. Things in the comic that are not true: *Dinosaurs did not talk *There were no cabins, cars, or women when dinosaurs lived *The dinosaurs in this comic (Tyrannosaurus Rex, Dromiceiomimus, and Utahraptor) did not live at the same time or even in the same places. *Tyrannosaurus Rex was not friendly Category:Comics Category:Webcomics
title: Dinosaur Comics
